content.webTitle: The only rooftop pool in the city of canals

fields.headline: Venice view
fields.bodyText: A 19th-century flour mill has become Venice's only hotel with a rooftop pool, offering sweeping views of the city. The Hilton Molino Stucky Venice, which opened this week, also has the city's largest spa, five bars and two restaurants headed up by former Cipriani chef Franco Luise. The façade has been restored, inside the original mosaic of Demetra, goddess of harvest, is at the top of the penthouse tower - so out of sight of most visitors. They'll have to make do with the original bell that announced the end of daily shifts at the mill which now hangs in the lobby. · Doubles from £133, hilton.com
